post:
Hello everyone,

I am pleased to announce that our 128MB vps package is back!
Our servers are located in Sweden, your vps will be hosted in our own private cloud, each vps has a 1Gbps shared uplink connected to our 10GB backbone switches.
Disks are setup in raid10, you will be able to manage your vps through our control panel.

We ignore ALL DMCA requests, we believe that an American law does not apply in Sweden.
This vps and all our other packages are perfectly suitable for movie sharing websites, warez websites, torrents and more.
We do not allow coin mining, ddos attacks, cam software, SPAM.

Sweden Dedicated does not oversell, all our nodes feature dual quadcore processors and plenty of memory, it is technically not even possible to oversell with KVM.

No contract

No setup fee

Instant activation!

Free ipv6

Free rDNS

Bitcoins accepted!

In this business since 2006!

`128MB memory
256MB burstable memory
6GB storage
300GB bandwidth
1 ipv4 ip
1Gbps uplink
€5 per month`

Order here: http://swedendedicated.com/portal/?ccce=cart&a=add&pid=22
Or find out more here: http://swedendedicated.com/vps
